#summary Instructions for how to use the code.

Download the code using svn, or grab the Python code by browsing under the source tab.

To avois endless parameter lists, most settings are defined in the module pywrfplotParams. You must change the settings here.

Make you own Python file and use the methods in the modules. For instance:

mapWRF.mapDomains()

or 

mapWRF.mapWind(nest=3,time=45)
